## slu tools mon

Simple VM monitoring tool

```
slu tools mon [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -c, --config string   Path to slu_mon.yaml config file (default ".slu_mon.yaml")
  -h, --help            help for mon
  -s, --sleep int       Sleep time in minutes between checks (default 10)
```
